items.sentence: You said almost all of your friends were Canadians.
Tom told me that he\'d like to become a bus driver.
Tom tried moving the bookcase without Mary\'s help.
You don\'t want Tom to think you\'re crazy, do you?
Are you suggesting that I am not telling the truth?
Why don\'t we introduce ourselves to our neighbors?
Why don\'t you ask me what you really want to know?
Why don\'t you come out here and look for yourself?
Why don\'t you come to my house and play the piano?
Why don\'t you come to my house in the near future?
